website_summaries.verdict: A full and extensive modelling experience that produces a Vietnam-era Naval patrol boat.
pros: Detailed construction model kit comes with highly detailed small parts such as small turrets
Removable turrets allows for customization and alteration
cons: Difficult instructions can make the assembly process more difficult for the smaller pieces

customer_reviews.title: Purchase of PBR model.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this model for a friend that was on an actual PBR in Vietnam. He was extremely impressed with the model. Said it was exact in many areas. He was very pleased and wanting to put it together as soon as he gets time.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: A very nice model from Yamiya
customer_reviews.text: A very nice model from Yamiya. Good size-about 10-12" long. Good detail. Parts fit together well. Directions easy to follow. I recommend this model highly.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Alexander, Jr

customer_reviews.title: Superb kit. Have built as MkII from early 1970s ...
customer_reviews.text: Superb kit. Have built as MkII from early 1970s; also using as base for MkII "Hard Top" from mid-1980s. Kit supports customization to reflect specific boats, periods, and areas of use.
customer_reviews.author: Joan C

customer_reviews.title: As always great product from Tamiya
customer_reviews.text: Just got it,cant wait to get started.As always great product from Tamiya.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher G.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Kit
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality model kit with details down to beer bottles! I have been building model kits for over 40 years and this Tamiya kit is top of the line for it's price.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as promised. Took a while, but was expected, coming from Japan.
customer_reviews.author: Dragon SM

customer_reviews.title: Remembering
customer_reviews.text: This product was not purchased as a toy but as a model of the actual boat. It is a true replica.
customer_reviews.author: Skipper

customer_reviews.title: Pibber,
customer_reviews.text: I think, I like it. Haven't received it yet. Plan on using this model, for parts, for the MTB 77.
customer_reviews.author: R.See

customer_reviews.title: MY MODLE
customer_reviews.text: IT IS THE SAME BOAT FORM THE RIVERS I HAD AN AWARD MODLE BUILDER DO THE BUILDING OF THE MODLE FOR MY WALL
customer_reviews.author: thomas l akers

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Larger than the Carrier models I ordered and far more expensive than its worth!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald P Brown Jr

product_meta.title: Tamiya Models US Navy PBR31 Mk.II Model Kit
product_meta.description: US Navy PBR31 Mk.II "Pibber". Vietnam era brown water Patrol Boat, River or PBR kit. Features detailed full hull, deck fittings, cockpit and weapons. Also includes display stand, 4 crew figures in action poses, 55 gallon drums, crew's personal effects and printed paper flag.
feature_bullets: The leader in hobby products around the world
Made using the highest quality components and materials

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars51 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
